name: Critical (Nexust)
description:
GMTK Jam version

Sorry the text box is so messed up. Broke it without enough time to fix it again.

A bit of a rush to the finish line. There are typos and the game's narrative had to be cut short. I will continue this game's development and make something decent out of it post-jam.

There are (kind of) multiple endings. If it hadn't been for a last minute bug causing the cutscene to crash, it would be more obvious. But depending on your (admitedly limited) choices, the game ends differently.

I reccomend playing with a game pad, but keyboard works fine too.
